parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the visualization cluster.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the visualization instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number of the page to return.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description:
The username of the entity whose instances you want to query.

>  If this parameter is not specified, instances of all users are queried.

parameters.name: UserUid
parameters.description:
The user ID of the entity whose instances you want to query.

>  If this parameter is not specified, instances of all users are queried.
